name: Rushroom
description:
Hello!

A small team of four developers created this game during the Global Game Jam 2020.
Ruthenium (Twitter) - Art
David Naussed (Twitter) - Programming 
Arvid Kallin  (SoundCloud) - Music
Hampus Paulsen (Linkedin) - Level Design

Note: Tap "w" twice for a double jump.

If you really want the source code or anything,  just mention it in the comments or find one of us online.
